## Information

- **Contest ID/Name:** *e.g. 1/Sleeping Cup #1*
- **Cheater ID(s)/Name(s):** *e.g. 18/polygon*

## Evidence

*Example: The A solution of that guy is just identical to that given by DeepSeek R1!*
